Meanwhile, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w staying|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w* \w tree|strong="H7416"\w* \f + \fr 14:2 \ft Or around the rock of Rimmon or in the pomegranate cave; see Judges 20:45, Judges 20:47, and Judges 21:13.\f* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Migron|strong="H4051"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w outskirts|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w numbered|strong="H3967"\w* \w about|strong="H5971"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*,

including Ahijah, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w wearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* ephod. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ichabod’s brother Ahitub \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2088"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w were|strong="H6430"\w* \w cliffs|strong="H5553"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w sides|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* intended \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* reach \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* outpost. \w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* Bozez \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w Seneh|strong="H5573"\w*.

One cliff stood \w to|strong="H6828"\w* \w the|strong="H4136"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*, \w and|strong="H6828"\w* \w the|strong="H4136"\w* other \w to|strong="H6828"\w* \w the|strong="H4136"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w*.

“Very well,” said \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, “\w we|strong="H3068"\w* will \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w toward|strong="H5674"\w* these men \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w show|strong="H1540"\w* ourselves \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w them|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w terror|strong="H2731"\w* \w struck|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Philistines \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* outposts \w and|strong="H5971"\w* raiding parties \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w quaked|strong="H7264"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* panic spread \w from|strong="H1961"\w* God.\f + \fr 14:15 \ft Or and a terrible panic spread\f*

Jonathan Eats the Honey

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* distress \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* placed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H3478"\w* oath, saying, “Cursed \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* eats \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* enemies.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w tasted|strong="H2938"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.
